price: 41. Boye bazali kornona te ete, tokoya na mabele mpe tozali kokutola yango epai na epai? Mpe Allah nde mokati wa makambo, mpe moko te akoki koboya bokati bwa ye, mpe azali noki тропа kopesa lifuti.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا نَأۡتِي ٱلۡأَرۡضَ نَنقُصُهَا مِنۡ أَطۡرَافِهَاۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَحۡكُمُ لَا مُعَقِّبَ لِحُكۡمِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw annā natī al-arḍa nanquṣuhā min aṭrāfihā wal-lahu yaḥkumu lā muʿaqqiba liḥuk'mihi wahuwa sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
